thread.title: Xeneta raises $12M Series B to crack open ocean freight pricing
thread.title_full: Xeneta raises $12M Series B to crack open ocean freight pricing

author: Steve O'Hear
title: Xeneta raises $12M Series B to crack open ocean freight pricing
text:
Xeneta raises $12M Series B to crack open ocean freight pricing Posted Alibaba’s Ant Financial is raising $3B in debt to finance a global M&A spree 
Xeneta , the Oslo, Norway-based startup that offers a crowdsourced price comparison service for ocean freight, has raised $12 million in Series B funding. 
Leading the round is London-based Smedvig Capital, with participation from existing investors, including Creandum, and Alliance Venture. It brings total raised since Xeneta was founded in 2012 to $20.5 million. 
Aiming to disrupt the traditionally opaque $200 billion-plus container shipping market, Xeneta has built what it describes as an “ocean freight benchmarking and market intelligence” platform that relies on the ‘crowd’ to share data on container shipping prices from shipper and freight forwarders. Related Articles Xeneta Raises Further $5.3M To Bring Greater Transparency To Sea Freight Prices Xeneta Raises $1.6M To Crowdsource Price Comparisons For Sea Freight Online freight marketplace Freightos acquires Spain's WebCargoNet With A Fresh $14M, Freightos Wants To Power The Global Freight Industry Online Freight Network Freightos Raises $4.6M Series B The idea is to crack open ocean freight pricing and provide much greater visibility into market average prices on upwards of 160,000 global trade routes. I’m told the company has crowdsourced over 23 million shipping prices, enabling it to offer these prices back to the industry in real-time.
Customers include Kraft Heinz, Electrolux, Continental, Thyssenkrupp, Akzo Nobel, Brother International, in addition to leading suppliers in the automotive, chemical and retail industries. 
Meanwhile, Xeneta says the new capital will be used to fund the startup’s continued global expansion and for product development. 0
